#Text=The Miami Heat ( 32 - 17 ) came back in the second half to beat the Denver Nuggets ( 15 - 25 ) 98 - 95 on Friday .
#Text=The Nuggets got out to a great start on Friday by recording two 31 - point quarters in the first half to take a 16 - point lead , but collapsed in the second half .
#Text=The Heat outscored the Nuggets 52 - 33 in the second half in an impressive comeback win .
#Text=The key for Miami was their stellar defense , as they held Denver to 41 percent shooting while recording 13 blocks .
#Text=What 's most impressive is that they got this win with no Dwyane Wade or Goran Dragic in the lineup .
#Text=Miami came into this game extremely shorthanded , but walked away with a huge road win .
#Text=Hassan Whiteside was an absolute monster in this game , as he recorded his second triple - double of the season .
#Text=He finished the game with 19 points , 17 rebounds and 11 blocks in a spectacular game .
#Text=Chris Bosh was efficient in this game as well , as he scored 24 points on just 13 shot attempts .
#Text=The darkhorse hero was Beno Udrih though , as he collected 11 points and 11 assists while filing in for Dragic in the victory .
#Text=On deck for Miami is an even tougher task , as they travel to Oklahoma City on Sunday to take on the Thunder .
#Text=Denver was coming off two of their biggest wins of the season and really should have had their third - straight here .
#Text=The offense fell apart in the second half and all the momentum was in Miami 's favor for the final 15 minutes of this game .
#Text=Danilo Gallinari and Will Barton have been carrying this team all year long , but they combined for just 20 points and 12 rebounds while going 4 - for - 18 from the field .
#Text=Darrell Arthur got a rare start in the absence of Jusuf Nurkic and had the best game for Denver , as he finished with 18 points and eight rebounds in the loss .
#Text=Rookie Emmanuel Mudiay also had a nice game off the bench , as he scored 16 points .
#Text=The Nuggets will continue their eight - game homestand on Sunday when they host the Indiana Pacers in their next fixture .
